languages.text: "Мне незачем вам врать. Но вы ведь все равно не поверите — без доказательств. Впрочем, я читала труды Фергюса-Клеона, и мне понятен ход ваших мыслей. Недоверие — естественное защитное поведение большинства существ, поэтому меня оно не оскорбляет".

traits.locale_text: "Мне незачем вам врать. Но вы ведь все равно не поверите — без доказательств. Впрочем, я читала труды Фергюса-Клеона, и мне понятен ход ваших мыслей. Недоверие — естественное защитное поведение большинства существ, поэтому меня оно не оскорбляет".

languages.text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."
languages.original_text: "Мне незачем вам врать. Но вы ведь все равно не поверите — без доказательств. Впрочем, я читала труды Фергюса-Клеона, и мне понятен ход ваших мыслей. Недоверие — естественное защитное поведение большинства существ, поэтому меня оно не оскорбляет".

traits.locale_text: "I have no reasons to lie, but you are still not going to believe me without proof. However, I read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is the natural protective behaviour of most creatures, so it does not offend me."

"I have no reasons to lie, but you are still not going to believe me without proof. However, I read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is the natural protective behaviour of most creatures, so it does not offend me."

"I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

"I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

languages.text: "Ich habe keinen Grund, zu lügen, aber ohne Beweis glaubt Ihr mir dennoch nicht. Ich habe jedoch die Schriften von Fergus-Kleon gelesen und verstehe Euren Gedankengang. Misstrauen ist in den meisten Lebewesen ein angeborenes Verteidigungsverhalten, ich werte das also nicht als Beleidigung."
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keinen Grund, zu lügen, aber ohne Beweis glaubt Ihr mir dennoch nicht. Ich habe jedoch die Schriften von Fergus-Kleon gelesen und verstehe Euren Gedankengang. Misstrauen ist in den meisten Lebewesen ein angeborenes Verteidigungsverhalten, ich werte das also nicht als Beleidigung."

languages.text: « Je n'ai aucune raison de vous mentir, mais sans preuve, je doute que vous me croyiez. Ayant lu les écrits de Fergus-Kléon, je peux néanmoins comprendre votre cheminement de pensée. La méfiance est un mécanisme de défense inné chez un certain nombre de créatures, je n'ai donc aucune raison de vous en vouloir. »
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai aucune raison de vous mentir, mais sans preuve, je doute que vous me croyiez. Ayant lu les écrits de Fergus-Kléon, je peux néanmoins comprendre votre cheminement de pensée. La méfiance est un mécanisme de défense inné chez un certain nombre de créatures, je n'ai donc aucune raison de vous en vouloir. »

languages.text: “我没有理由撒谎，但只要我拿不出证据，你就依然不肯相信我。不要紧，我读过弗格斯·克莱昂的著作，我能理解你的感受。对绝大多数生物而言，怀疑是天生的防御行为，因此我并不觉得冒犯。”
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

traits.locale_text: “我没有理由撒谎，但只要我拿不出证据，你就依然不肯相信我。不要紧，我读过弗格斯·克莱昂的著作，我能理解你的感受。对绝大多数生物而言，怀疑是天生的防御行为，因此我并不觉得冒犯。”

languages.text: 「嘘をつく理由はありませんわ。けれど、証拠がなくてはまだあたくしを信じてくださらないでしょう。とは言え、あたくしはファーガス・クレオンの書物を読んだので、あなたの思考の流れを理解しています。疑念はほとんどの生き物が本来持っている防御行動ですので、別に腹を立てておりません」
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

traits.locale_text: 「私に嘘をつく理由はないが、お前はまだ証拠なしに私を信じてはくれまい。しかし、私はファーガス・クレオンが書いた物を読み、お前の思考の流れを理解している。不信感はほとんどの生き物が本来持っている防御行動だから、私は別に腹を立てていない」
「嘘をつく理由はありませんわ。けれど、証拠がなくてはまだあたくしを信じてくださらないでしょう。とは言え、あたくしはファーガス・クレオンの書物を読んだので、あなたの思考の流れを理解しています。疑念はほとんどの生き物が本来持っている防御行動ですので、別に腹を立てておりません」

languages.text: «No tengo motivos para mentir, pero no me creerá sin pruebas. Sin embargo, habiendo leído las obras de Fergus-Kleon, entiendo su forma de pensar. La desconfianza es un mecanismo de defensa innato en la mayoría de criaturas, por lo que no me ofendo».
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo motivos para mentir, pero no me creerá sin pruebas. Sin embargo, habiendo leído las obras de Fergus-Kleon, entiendo su forma de pensar. La desconfianza es un mecanismo de defensa innato en la mayoría de criaturas, por lo que no me ofendo».

languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

languages.text: "Yalan söylemek için bir sebebim yok ancak kanıtım olmadan bana inanmayacaksın. Fergus-Kleon'un yazdıklarını okudum ve nasıl bir düşünce yapısına sahip olduğunu biliyorum. Şüphe, çoğu varlık için doğuştan gelen bir savunma mekanizmasıdır. Bu nedenle üzerime alınmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie, but you still won't believe me without proof. However, I have read the writings of Fergus-Kleon and understand your train of thought. Distrust is an innate defensive behaviour in most creatures, so I take no offence."

traits.locale_text: "Yalan söylemek için bir sebebim yok ancak kanıtım olmadan bana inanmayacaksın. Fergus-Kleon'un yazdıklarını okudum ve nasıl bir düşünce yapısına sahip olduğunu biliyorum. Şüphe, çoğu varlık için doğuştan gelen bir savunma mekanizmasıdır. Bu nedenle üzerime alınmıyorum."
